title: How to Get a High Bounty in Need for Speed Most Wanted

steps.title: Then drive to the bus station.
steps.content: Then drive to the bus station.

steps.title: Drive on top of the buses.
steps.content: Drive on top of the buses.

steps.title: Make sure the front end of your car is over the end of the buses so the cops can see you but can't get to you.
steps.content: Make sure the front end of your car is over the end of the buses so the cops can see you but can't get to you.

steps.title: The cops will keep on ramming the buses and immobilize their cars.
steps.content: The cops will keep on ramming the buses and immobilize their cars.

steps.title: Look behind you cops might climb onto the buses as well.
steps.content: Look behind you cops might climb onto the buses as well.

steps.title: When your ready and got enough bounty jump off the buses.
steps.content: When your ready and got enough bounty jump off the buses.

steps.title: Then smash through the petrol station.
steps.content: Then smash through the petrol station.

steps.title: Then get away!!
steps.content: Then get away!! and hide in the gas station
